name: jSSLKeyLog
short_description: jSSLKeyLog is a Java Agent Library that logs SSL session keys of connections created by a Java application to a log file understood by Wireshark, so that "Follow SSL stream" can be used to debug SSL connection issues as if the connection was not encrypted. Works with both Java server and client software.
summary: Java Agent Library to log SSL session keys to a file for Wireshark
